about_the_game:
■Gothic Castle Music DLC

This collection includes a variety of Castlevania inspired music to fill your games with catchy yet haunting gothic melodies. It features a total of 15 different tracks to cover the many different areas of your games.

■Various music themes for different situations

Each music track is between 1 and 2 minutes, with more than 20 minutes of unique music for your games.

Contents
01. Swirling Darkness. A prelude for an impending calamity. Also a good menu/game over theme.
02. Unwritten Epitaph. An introduction theme, perfect for inserting passwords and character names.
03. Ascension. Song created with a platformer in mind. Ideal to reach undreamed heights in your citadel of madness.
04. Indigo Nocturnal Leaves. Inspired by Curse of Darkness, this song reminisces of a misty night forest and will o wisps.
05. Satyr Dance: Tangling, melodic, pagan and catchy, with a final touch of concealed evil.
06. March of the Dragon Prince. A song which could perhaps work as a final area with great things at stake.
07. Night Vanquisher. Song for cinematic scenes, game trailers and more.
08. Ascoltare. A quiet respite in the haunted castle. One filled with books and items to sell. A safe room, perchance.
09. Blood Prince Toccata. If you want to introduce a mini-boss, this is your song.
10. May I have this Dance. Waltzing vampires dream with such a song. Join them.
11. Powers of Darkness. A song to summon a true festival of servants into your lair.
12. Archetype of Futility. Sad, melancholic and resigned. A thousand broken hearts screaming in a single melody.
13. Ars Magistra. An alternative, more dynamic version of 08.Ascoltare. A holy song for vanquishing your foes.
14. Moonlit Flight. The right song for an elegant warrior, dancing through the night.
15. Tenebris Animam. A most formidable foe, it's motifs match those of 07. Night Vanquisher, so that that dreamed confrontation can finally occur.

--------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
